DESCRIPTION

A list of XBM images used by G15Purple. All images were created in GIMP. The resulting code was then copied from the .xbm files here. The files may be edited in the same manner.

Function Documentation

void g15rx_drawXBM ( g15canvas *  canvas,
unsigned char *  data,
int  width,
int  height,
int  pos_x,
int  pos_y 
)

Renders XBM image files to the screen.

Author:
Rynor < http://www.g15tools.com/forum/viewtopic.php?p=333#p333
Parameters:
canvas Canvas which will be written to
data The XBM file data that is to be displayed. Stored in a char array.
width The width of the image
height The height of the image
pos_x The X coordinate the top left of the image is to be drawn
pos_y The Y coordinate the top left of the image is to be drawn
